de.braintags.io.vertx.pojomapper.mapping

Interface ITriggerContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    io.vertx.core.AsyncResult<java.lang.Void>, io.vertx.core.Future<java.lang.Void>

    public interface ITriggerContext
extends io.vertx.core.Future<java.lang.Void>
    An ITriggerContext can be used as argument for mapper methods, which are annotated by one of the annotations like BeforeSave, AfterSave etc. Inside the implementation of the trigger method you will implement the functionality like: 
     try {
   IDataStore datastore = getMapper().getMapperFactory().getDataStore();
   // do some suitable actions for the trigger
   future.complete();
 } catch (Exception e) {
   future.fail(e);
 }

      • Fields inherited from interface io.vertx.core.Future

        factory
